nodes.text: An individual served as a colonel in the Galactic Empire and was aboard Galidraan Station when the rebel cell commanded by Berch Teller attacked the station with the hijacked Carrion Spike, the personal vessel of Moff Wilhuff Tarkin. After having been relieved by Tarkin and Darth Vader, he assisted the two in calculating possible hyperspace egress points for the stolen vessel, as well as providing details on Imperial Military forces stationed in the surrounding systems.
